title: Dick Clark's New Year's Rockin' Eve with Ryan Seacrest
resume: A much cherished annual tradition since 1972, the show includes special musical performances, reports on New Year’s celebrations from around the globe and the traditional countdown to midnight along with the iconic Times Square ball drop.
